info.name: OkCupid - ad removal & homepage cleanup
info.description:
Removes the new "Some matches you might like" section, and the ads around the site.

June 11th: removes the rather insidious "username's favourite books brought to you by..." advert on profile pages.

June 14th: makes some changes to the previous edit, removes a few more ad blocks.

June 17th: nuked another couple of ads.
